significant news by disputing the NFL's assertion that teams can still use the franchise tag to retain stars, even if the collective bargaining agreement expires in March. The NFLPA advised agents of their view. You can franchise anyone you want by whatever date you want, but if there is no CBA, the franchise tag will be meaningless, DeMaurice Smith said.
